title: Hunza Valley Discovery
description: Explore the breathtaking Hunza Valley with its stunning mountain views, ancient forts, and warm hospitality. Visit Karimabad, Baltit Fort, and enjoy the spectacular scenery of Rakaposhi and Ultar peaks.

itinerary.description: Airport pickup and briefing

itinerary.description: Explore Passu Cones and visit Sost border town

title: Lahore Heritage Walk
description: Discover the magnificent Mughal architecture and rich cultural heritage of Lahore. Visit the iconic Badshahi Mosque, Lahore Fort, and explore the vibrant streets of the old city.

itinerary.title: Old City Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Badshahi Mosque and Lahore Fort

itinerary.title: Cultural Immersion
itinerary.description: Explore Shalimar Gardens and local bazaars

itinerary.description: Food Street tour and cultural sites

title: Karachi Coastal Adventure
description: Experience the bustling metropolis of Karachi with its beautiful coastline, historic sites, and vibrant food culture. Visit Clifton Beach, explore the old quarters, and enjoy the sunset at Sea View.

itinerary.title: City Heritage Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Quaid-e-Azam Mausoleum and historic downtown

itinerary.title: Coastal Experience
itinerary.description: Clifton Beach and Sea View sunset

itinerary.title: Market & Culture
itinerary.description: Empress Market and local neighborhoods

title: K2 Base Camp Trek
description: The ultimate adventure to the base camp of the world's second-highest mountain, K2. Experience the raw beauty of the Karakoram range and challenge yourself on this legendary trek.

itinerary.description: Cross Paiju glacier to Khoburtse

itinerary.description: Trek to K2 Base Camp - the ultimate destination

itinerary.description: Continue descent to Goro II

description: Discover the Switzerland of Pakistan - Swat Valley with its lush green valleys, crystal clear rivers, and peaceful Buddhist heritage sites.

title: Skardu Adventure
description: Explore the gateway to the world's highest peaks. Visit stunning lakes, dramatic valleys, and experience the unique Balti culture of Skardu.

description: Trek to the magical Fairy Meadows for breathtaking views of Nanga Parbat, the 'Killer Mountain'. Perfect for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts.
